kenlm_model.helpTip: Name of the pretrained model file

causal_model_name.helpTip: Name of the HuggingFace model to load. Required for the Causal model. Default: facebook/opt-125m

causal_model_path.helpTip: Pretrained model path, relative to causal.py directory. Leave blank if using HuggingFace model

mixture_types.helpTip: Defines the types of models to be used by the mixture model. Default: CAUSAL, KENLM

mixture_weights.helpTip: Defines the weights of models to be used by the mixture model. Must sum to 1. Default: 0.3, 0.7

mixture_params.helpTip: Defines the extra parameters of models to be used by the mixture model. Default: None
